ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:1}); // Narration
“Long, long ago…”{PAUSE}“An evil shadow appeared over the
peaceful kingdom of Galdia…”{PAUSE}“Princess Rosa was kidnapped
by the Evil Dragon King,
Valvados. What will become of her?”{PAUSE}“Just then,
the legendary hero, Alfred, appears!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // Narration
“Oh what is going to happen next?
Oh…legendary hero…look!”

ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // King
“Oh…legendary hero, Alfred.
You have come to save my beloved
Rosa…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:9}); // King
“On the peak of a dangerous mountain…
dwells the Evil Dragon King, Valvados…
who's kidnapped Princess Rosa…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:10}); // King
“But…
you can't beat the Evil Dragon King now!
Talk to one who can help you…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:42}); // King
“Now let's all return…
and celebrate.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // EDK
“I am the Evil Dragon King…Valvados!
I have not harmed the Princess…
I have been expecting…you!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:26}); // EDK
“Gaaaaaah!
Here I come, legendary hero…Alfred!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:27}); // EDK
“I already know…
your name!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:40}); // EDK
“Arrggaahhh!!
Curses…
The power of…love!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:31}); // EDK
“What ho! You dare
ignore the Evil Dragon King!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:59}); // EDK
“Gaaaaaahh!
You dare ignore me!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // Knight

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // Knight
“Oh……You must be

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // Knight
“By my soul,
please…please save Princess Rosa!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // Knight
“Now…please talk…
to the King!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // Knight
“I am…a lowly…knight.
How…can I help you?”

ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // Wizard
“I am the great wizard, Vorman.
What do you wish to know?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:16}); // Wizard
“Ahh, the weakness of the Evil Dragon King.
It must be, it must be…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:17}); // Wizard
“Yes, it must be…
True love!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:18}); // Wizard
“The power of love…
Is the only weapon that can withstand
the fangs of the Evil Dragon King…!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:28}); // Wizard
“And now…legendary hero…! Here is
what will happen…to your beloved…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:29}); // Wizard
“A kiss!
The power of True Love!!”

dialogStrings:
Narration
“Long, long ago…”{PAUSE}“An evil shadow appeared over the
peaceful kingdom of Galdia…”{PAUSE}“Princess Rosa was kidnapped
by the Evil Dragon King,
Valvados. What will become of her?”{PAUSE}“Just then,
the legendary hero, Alfred, appears!!”

Knight
“Oh……You must be
the legendary hero…Alfred!”

Knight
“By my soul,
please…please save Princess Rosa!”

King
“Oh…legendary hero, Alfred.
You have come to save my beloved
Rosa…”

King
“On the peak of a dangerous mountain…
dwells the Evil Dragon King, Valvados…
who's kidnapped Princess Rosa…”

King
“But…
you can't beat the Evil Dragon King now!
Talk to one who can help you…”

“Who will you talk to?
{CHOICE}The knight
{CHOICE}The wizard

Wizard
“I am the great wizard, Vorman.
What do you wish to know?”

{CHOICE}The Evil Dragon King's weakness
{CHOICE}The Princess' measurements

Knight
“I am…a lowly…knight.
How…can I help you?”

{CHOICE}Defeat the Evil Dragon King
{CHOICE}Defeat the King

Wizard
“Ahh, the weakness of the Evil Dragon King.
It must be, it must be…”

Wizard
“Yes, it must be…
True love!”

Wizard
“The power of love…
Is the only weapon that can withstand
the fangs of the Evil Dragon King…!”

Narration
“Oh what is going to happen next?
Oh…legendary hero…look!”

EDK
“I am the Evil Dragon King…Valvados!
I have not harmed the Princess…
I have been expecting…you!”

EDK
“Gaaaaaah!
Here I come, legendary hero…Alfred!”

Wizard
“And now…legendary hero…! Here is
what will happen…to your beloved…”

Wizard
“A kiss!
The power of True Love!!”

{CHOICE}Kiss the Princess
{CHOICE}Kiss the King
{CHOICE}Kiss the Evil Dragon King

EDK
“What ho! You dare
ignore the Evil Dragon King!?”

EDK
“Who is your enemy…?
Say it!”

King
“Now let's all return…
and celebrate.”

Narration
“Oh, how profound the power of love…
And so the legendary hero Alfred and
our story live on happily ever after.”

{Aeris}
“The play's a disaster!
Now I'm getting mad!”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud}!! Be serious!!
You really don't want to be
in the play that much, do you?”

{Yuffie}
“Come on, {Cloud}!!
I'm tryin' to be serious here
and you…”

Narration
“Oh my…what an unusually strong Princess!
And so the new legendary hero Rosa
and our story ends happily ever after.”

Beautiful Girl
“Thank…you.
You've released me…from the spell
and I am my normal self again…”
